title: Game freezes after every win/lose
body: everytime when i finish with a game and i click on continue then the game freezes. need to restart my whole computer or else it doesn't work anymore. I tried everthing I repaired my client removed the logitech stuff and reinstalled it but nothing works so i hope someone can find a solution.

replies.body: Do you have Windows 10?  A recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing issues for some players.  Disabling that should fix the issue.  Let me know!
I turned off the game bar but it still freezes and now it also freezes when i log in

In this case there may be other issues like drivers or game files failing to render the game.  Try our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help rule out possibilities and fix this up.  Hopefully that will do the trick!
i think i have a solution before i click continue i close league of legends with task manager and then it went to the scores
